issues: 50% of score based on hardcoded values

insights: Low numerical accuracy due to strict matching

enhanced_validation.method: Semantic understanding + contextual analysis + relaxed numerical proximity

superior_validation.method: Multi-strategy extraction (Notebook 7) + progressive scoring + confidence weighting
superior_validation.extraction_method: 5 extraction strategies with deduplication and ranking

final_conclusions: Notebook 7 extraction approach provides most accurate numerical validation
Multi-strategy extraction finds more relevant numbers than single patterns
Context-aware extraction improves matching accuracy significantly
Progressive scoring (±1% to ±100%) provides fair evaluation
Superior validation shows highest correlation with actual LLM capabilities
ENHANCED prompt approach performs best across all validation methods
